title: Co2(P4O12)/CoSe2 heterostructures grown on carbon nanofibers as an efficient electrocatalyst for water splitting
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00895B, Paper
Wenjing Cui, Xingwei Sun, Shaoshuai Xu, Chunping Li, Jie Bai
The construction of heterojunctions can regulate the local electronic structure of metal sites and promote mass transfer. ZIF-67 exposes more active sites. The combination of CoSe2, Co2(P4O12) and CNFs improves the conductivity of the material.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
